name: k6-contactlist-automation
description: K6 Performance Testing Suite for Contact List API (TypeScript)

scripts.test: npm run build && k6 run dist/main.js --out json=reports/results.json
scripts.test:refactored: npm run build && k6 run dist/main-refactored.js --out json=reports/results.json
scripts.test:smoke: npm run build && k6 run dist/main.js --env TEST_TYPE=smoke --out json=reports/smoke-results.json
scripts.test:load: npm run build && k6 run dist/load-test.js --out json=reports/load-results.json
scripts.test:stress: npm run build && k6 run dist/stress-test.js --out json=reports/stress-results.json
scripts.test:spike: npm run build && k6 run dist/main.js --env TEST_TYPE=spike --out json=reports/spike-results.json
scripts.test:auth: npm run build && k6 run dist/auth.test.js --out json=reports/auth-results.json
scripts.test:contacts: npm run build && k6 run dist/contacts.test.js --out json=reports/contacts-results.json
scripts.test:prod: npm run build && k6 run dist/main.js --env ENVIRONMENT=production --out json=reports/prod-results.json
scripts.test:qa: npm run build && k6 run dist/main.js --env ENVIRONMENT=qa --out json=reports/qa-results.json
scripts.test:staging: npm run build && k6 run dist/main.js --env ENVIRONMENT=staging --out json=reports/staging-results.json
scripts.test:report: npm run test:refactored && npm run report
